item.title: Ground Proximity Warning System (GPWS) – Terrain Awareness and Warning System (TAWS) – Terrain Display Functions – Both Inoperative

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "GPWS TAWS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
